content: an easy and fun way to brighten up the kitchen this versatile crochet dishcloth can be stitched in any colors that make you smile designed in our 100% cotton lily sugar n cream yarn you ll work in single_crochet in the back loop only and single_crochet 3-together to create a cloth that features deep textured ridges that make all sorts of clean-ups a breeze crochet a stack of these easy mitered squares and give as hostess gifts or stocking stuffers
